channel.title: This should happen
channel.description: On the server mods section [url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/board,183.0.html]http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/board,183.0.html[/url] I feel you should only post plugins that are 'custom made' by [u]THIS[/u] community. I don't feel it's right taking other peoples work and posting it whilst receiving "rep" for it. Just a thought.

item.title: This should happen
item.dc:creator: @lord_fear lord_fear
item.description:
@lord_fear wrote:

It’s just a thought…

Read full topic

item.title: This should happen
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“zuppers, post:4, topic:400279”][quote author=lord_fear link=topic=497351.msg3637262#msg3637262 date=1308683636]
Just doesn’t seem right, But your rules. So it’s obviously your call
[/quote]I don’t know why you think they would get rep for suggesting plugins anyhow.[/quote]

Or why it should matter either

Read full topic

item.title: This should happen
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It’s for posting plugins made by this community, and also posting about cool plugins you see elsewhere. It isn’t right or allowed though to post plugins you see elsewhere and try to claim them as your own, so I don’t see a problem if credit is given where credit is due.

Read full topic

item.title: This should happen
item.dc:creator: @lord_fear lord_fear
item.description:
@lord_fear wrote:

On the server mods section http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/board,183.0.html
I feel you should only post plugins that are ‘custom made’ by THIS community.
I don’t feel it’s right taking other peoples work and posting it whilst receiving “rep” for it.
Just a thought.

Read full topic
